name: Metal Slug: 2nd Mission
description:
Metal Slug: 2nd Mission is an action, shooter and platformer game developed by Ukiyotei. It came out on 22-05-2000. It was published by SNK. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Metal Slug: 2nd Mission is available on Nintendo Switch and Neo Geo.
It was scored by Yasuaki Fujita.
